description: By hijacking CBF-b, Vif (Viral infectivity factor, HIV protein) is manipulating the ubquitination machinery and adversely effecting host transcriptional regulation. This pathways was adapted from figure 3 in [Fraser et al](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23352243). Viral proteins are highlighted in yellow.
title: Dual hijack model of Vif in HIV infection
